category.name: Data Sharing.STEP Translator
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: STEP_approved_status
preference.preference_description: Supports only STEP AP214. Sets the defined item type as approved. Imports approved STEP data into Teamcenter as in-process data. This is accomplished by defining a list of strings that, when detected during import, denote approved status. Valid Values: One or more strings.
